alert.note: Alert for Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine; Eastern Toole and Liberty; Fergus County below 4500ft; Hill County; Northern Blaine County; Snowy and Judith Mountains; Western and Central Chouteau County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued November 03 at 2:46PM MDT until November 05 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE FRIDAY NIGHT THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph possible. * WHERE...Snowy and Judith Mountains, Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine, Eastern Toole and Liberty, Fergus County below 4500ft, Hill County, Northern Blaine County and Western and Central Chouteau County. * WHEN...From late Friday night through Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause isolated power outages. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates.
